installations.name: Abacus
installations.full_name: Abacus (British Columbia Research Libraries' Data Services) Dataverse
installations.description: Open for researchers associated with British Columbia universities to deposit data.

installations.name: ADA Dataverse
installations.description: The Australian Data Archive provides a national service for collecting, preserving, publishing and accessing digital research data.

installations.name: AUSSDA Dataverse
installations.description: AUSSDA - The Austrian Social Science Data Archive makes social science data accessible, creating opportunities for research and data reuse, benefitting science and society. AUSSDA serves as the Austrian representative in the Consortium of European Social Science Data Archives (CESSDA ERIC).

installations.name: Botswana Harvard Data
installations.description: The Botswana Harvard AIDS Institute Partneship is a world-renowned educational institution of excellence in research and education pertinent to HIV/AIDS and other emerging public health challenges. Established in 1996, the Botswana Harvard AIDS Institute Partnership (BHP) is a collaborative research and training initiative between Botswana’s Ministry of Health and Wellness and the Harvard T.H. Chan School of Public Health AIDS Initiative. The BHP Dataverse is a data repository for all the research done at BHP. Raw data, anonymised data and final analysis data for every research. This repository will achieve and also easy data sharing within the organisation and outside.

installations.name: Catalogues (CDSP)
installations.description:
Open for researchers and organizations associated with
French universities to deposit data. Hosted by the Center for
Socio-Political Data (Sciences Po and CNRS).

installations.name: CIFOR
installations.full_name: Center for International Forestry Research (CIFOR) Dataverse
installations.description: Center for International Forestry Research (CIFOR) Dataverse

installations.name: CIMMYT Research Data
installations.full_name: International Maize and Wheat Improvement Center
installations.description: Free, open access repository of research data and software produced and developed by CIMMYT scientists.

installations.name: CIRAD
installations.description:
Organisme français de recherche agronomique et de coopération internationale pour le développement durable des régions tropicales et méditerranéennes, les activités du CIRAD relèvent des sciences du vivant, des sciences sociales et des sciences de l’ingénieur appliquées à l’agriculture, à l’alimentation, à l’environnement et à la gestion des territoires.

French agricultural research and international cooperation organization working for the sustainable development of tropical and Mediterranean regions, CIRAD's activities concern the life sciences, social sciences and engineering sciences, applied to agriculture, the environment and territorial management.

installations.name: Dalhousie University Dataverse
installations.description: Share, publish and get credit for your data. Find and cite research data from across all research fields.

installations.name: Data Inra
installations.description:
INRA is Europe’s top agricultural research institute and the world’s number two centre for the agricultural sciences. Data Inra is offered by INRA as part of its mission to open the results of its research.

Data Inra will share research data in relation with food, nutrition, agriculture and environment. It includes experimental, simulation and observation data, omic data, survey and text data.

Only data produced by or in collaboration with INRA will be hosted in the repository, but anyone can access the metadata and the open data.

installations.name: Data Suds
installations.description: Hosted by IRD, a french public research institution, who defends an original model of equitable scientific partnership with the countries of the South and an interdisciplinary and citizen science, committed to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals.

installations.name: Dataverse e-cienciaDatos
installations.description: Repositorio de Datos del Consorcio Madroño.

installations.name: DataverseNL
installations.description: Open for researchers and organizations associated with Dutch universities to deposit data.

installations.name: DataverseNO
installations.description: Research data archive open for Norwegian research institutions. Operated by UiT The Arctic University of Norway.

installations.name: DR-NTU (Data)
installations.description: The institutional open access research data repository for Nanyang Technological University (NTU). NTU researchers are encouraged to use DR-NTU (Data) to deposit, publish and archive their final research data in order to make their research data discoverable, accessible and reusable.

installations.name: Fudan University
installations.description: Open for Fudan University affiliated researchers to deposit data.

installations.name: Göttingen Research Online
installations.description: Göttingen Research Online is an institutional repository for the publication of research data at the Göttingen Campus. It is managed by the Göttingen eResearch Alliance, a joint group of the Göttingen State and University Library and Gesellschaft für wissenschaftliche Datenverarbeitung mbH Göttingen.

installations.name: Harvard Dataverse
installations.description: Share, archive, and get credit for your data. Find and cite data across all research fields.

installations.name: HeiDATA
installations.description: Open for Heidelberg University affiliated researchers to deposit data.

installations.name: IBICT
installations.description: The network Cariniana, cariniana.ibict.br,  is funded entirely by the Brazilian government and in particular by MCTI (Ministério da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação). It is a project for long-term preservation of scientific publications in Brazil.

installations.name: ICRISAT
installations.description: International Crops Research Institute for the Semi-Arid Tropics.  Free open data repository of ICRISAT research data including Social science, Phenotypic, Genotypic, Spatial and Soil & Weather data which are linked with open publications.

installations.name: ICWSM
installations.full_name: International AAAI Conference on Web and Social Media
installations.description: Datasets from the International AAAI Conference on Web and Social Media (ICWSM).

installations.name: Ifsttar Dataverse
installations.full_name: French Institute of Science and Technology for Transport, Development and Networks
installations.description: Ifsttar Dataverse is an institutional repository for research data of the French Institute of Science and Technology for Transport, Development and Networks. It catalogues research data in the field of transports, spatial planning and civil engineering.

installations.name: IISH Dataverse
installations.description: The IISH Dataverse contains micro-, meso-, and macro-level datasets on social and economic history.

installations.name: International Potato Center
installations.description: Centro Internacional De La Papa (International Potato Center) is a member of the CGIAR Consortium, an international organization made up of 15 centers engaged in research for a food secure future.

installations.name: Johns Hopkins University
installations.description: Johns Hopkins University Data Archive

installations.name: Libra Data
installations.description: Libra Data is a place for UVA researchers to share data publicly, and is part of the Libra Scholarly Repository suite of services which includes works of UVA scholarship such as articles, books, theses, and data.

installations.name: LIPI Dataverse
installations.description: The Repositori Ilmiah Nasional (RIN) is a means to share, preserve, cite, explore, and analyze research data. RIN increases data availability and allows others to reproduce research more easily. Researchers, data authors, publishers, data distributors, and affiliate institutions all receive academic credit and web visibility. Researchers, agencies, and funders have full control over research data.

installations.name: Maine Dataverse Network
installations.description: A service brought to you by the ACG@UMaine. The way Supercomputing should be!

installations.name: MELDATA
installations.full_name: International Center for Agriculture Research in the Dry Areas
installations.description: The Dataverse portal of the International Center for Agricultural Research in Dry Ares.

installations.name: NIE Data Repository
installations.description: NIE Data Repository is the institutional open access research data repository for National Institute of Education, Singapore. NIE researchers are encouraged to use NIE Data Repository to deposit, publish and archive their final research data in order to make their research data discoverable, accessible and reusable.

installations.name: Peking University
installations.description: Peking University Open Research Data Platform

installations.name: Pontificia Universidad Católica del Perú
installations.description: El Instituto de Opinión Pública de la Pontificia Universidad Católica del Perú (IOP) se creó a finales del 2005 con la finalidad de generar un mayor conocimiento acerca de los fenómenos que interesan, preocupan y afectan a la sociedad peruana. Teniendo como eje metodológico el estudio de la opinión pública, el IOP investiga las creencias, actitudes y sentimientos que configuran las dinámicas sociales en el Perú.

installations.name: QDR Main Collection
installations.description: QDR curates, stores, preserves, publishes, and enables the download of digital data generated through qualitative and multi-method research in the social sciences. The repository develops and disseminates guidance for managing, sharing, citing, and reusing qualitative data, and contributes to the generation of common standards for doing so. QDR’s overarching goals are to make sharing qualitative data customary in the social sciences, to broaden access to social science data, and to strengthen qualitative and multi-method research.

installations.name: Repositório de Dados de Pesquisa da UFABC
Repositório de Dados de Pesquisa do ILEEL
installations.full_name: Institute of Linguistics and Literature (Federal University of Uberlândia)
installations.description: Research data repository of Institute of Linguistics and Literature / Federal University of Uberlandia

installations.name: Repositorio de Datos de Investigación Universidad del Rosario
installations.description: Explore research data from Universidad del Rosario affiliated researchers.

installations.name: Scholars Portal
installations.description: Open for researchers and organizations associated with Ontario universities to deposit data.

installations.name: Texas Data Repository Dataverse
installations.description: A statewide archive of research data from Texas Digital Library (TDL) member institutions.

installations.name: UAL Dataverse
installations.description: Open for University of Alberta affiliated researchers to deposit data.

installations.name: UNC Dataverse
installations.full_name: Odum Institute for Research in Social Science
installations.description: Open for all researchers worldwide from all disciplines to deposit data. The Odum Institute also offers multiple data curation service levels. For more information, go to http://www.irss.unc.edu/odum/contentPrimary.jsp?nodeid=5.

installations.name: Università degli Studi di Milano
installations.description: The University of Milan is home to important research teams operating in the university's extremely rich variety of scientific-disciplinary sectors. Besides taking part in the most relevant national and international research programs, the University is also very active in the field of technology transfer and developing applications for scientific research results. dataverse.unimi.it is the repository for research data offered to all researchers in disciplines from health sciences to laws, from economics to hard sciences, from humanities to mathematics.

installations.name: UWI
installations.full_name: The University of the West Indies
installations.description: The University of the West Indies Research Datasets Repository.

installations.name: VTTI
installations.description: Transportation data repository maintained by the Virginia Tech Transportation Institute.
